H0.text: Which piece of laboratory equipment consists of a vertical cylindrical piece of glassware, graduated volumetrically along its length, with a stopcock at the bottom? It is used to dispense known amounts of liquids.. Pipette

H1.text: Which piece of laboratory equipment consists of a vertical cylindrical piece of glassware, graduated volumetrically along its length, with a stopcock at the bottom? It is used to dispense known amounts of liquids.. Volumetric Flask

H2.text: Which piece of laboratory equipment consists of a vertical cylindrical piece of glassware, graduated volumetrically along its length, with a stopcock at the bottom? It is used to dispense known amounts of liquids.. Separatory Funnel

H3.text: Which piece of laboratory equipment consists of a vertical cylindrical piece of glassware, graduated volumetrically along its length, with a stopcock at the bottom? It is used to dispense known amounts of liquids.. Burets

A4.text: A burette is a graduated glass tube with a tap at one end, for delivering known volumes of a liquid.

A5.text: The flow of liquid from the tube to the burette tip is controlled by the stopcock valve.
